credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
title: 2 Fish in Waves
provenance:
Jordan-Volpe Gallery, New York

Marcia and William Goodman
description: Sea green vase. White clay body, thrown. Cylindrical body with short inset neck with thick lip; molded flat foot. Decorated with two fish above three tiers of foamy waves. Underglaze slip colors are shades of green: fish are an olive green, water is blue-green with slightly raised ridges of white. Above fish is dark olive green area. Allover light green glaze; fine cracklature. Interior and bottom glazed.
name: Vase
